query.mssql: update {0} set DocumentInfo = docs.Name from (select task.id Task, docs.Name Name from {0} task join Sungero_WF_Attachment attachment on task.Id = attachment.Task join Sungero_Content_EDoc docs on attachment.AttachmentId = docs.Id where attachment.[Group] = '804f50fe-f3da-411b-bb2e-e5373936e029') docs where id = docs.Task and ReportSessionId = '{1}'
query.postgres: update {0} set DocumentInfo = docs.Name from (select task.id Task, docs.Name from {0} task join Sungero_WF_Attachment attachment on task.Id = attachment.Task join Sungero_Content_EDoc docs on attachment.AttachmentId = docs.Id where attachment.Group = '804f50fe-f3da-411b-bb2e-e5373936e029') docs where id = docs.Task and ReportSessionId = '{1}'

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_AIExecReport temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by RowIndex

query.mssql: create table {0} ([RowIndex] int NOT NULL, [Id] int NOT NULL, [Hyperlink] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [ActionItemText] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [Author] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [State] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [PlanDate] nvarchar(max), [PlanDateSort] nvarchar(max), [ActualDate] nvarchar(max), [Overdue] nvarchar(max), [Assignee] nvarchar(max), [CoAssignees] nvarchar(max), [DocumentInfo] nvarchar(max), [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} (RowIndex int NOT NULL, Id int NOT NULL, Hyperlink citext NOT NULL, ActionItemText citext NOT NULL, Author citext NOT NULL, State citext NOT NULL, PlanDate citext, PlanDateSort timestamp, ActualDate citext, Overdue int, Assignee citext, CoAssignees citext, DocumentInfo citext, ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL)
